name: Twisted Truth
description:
This a short action-horror game in 2D.  The player have to get throught multiple levels in a building to turn the light back on. The player is equiped with a torchlight that reveal true appearence of his surrounding, including the monsters.  

The player can focus his torchlight to gradually reveal the monsters, once they are fully revealed, they can be dazzed by the light, and damaged by the player.

Monsters that are partialy revealed are immune to player's attack, the torchlight has a limited battery, once it's depleted, the game is over.
